title: Bug 6410: File remains unchanged but appears dirty after code assist
description: Bug 6410: The file remains unchanged, but it appears dirty after code assist.
OB: After performing code assist, the file is marked as dirty even though no changes were made. Additionally, code assist does not appear.
EB: After performing code assist, the file should remain unchanged and not appear dirty. Code assist should also appear as expected.
SR:
1. Open the file.
2. Trigger the code assist feature.
3. Check if the file is marked as dirty without any actual changes.
4. Verify if the code assist feature appears.
